Package org.spongepowered.configurate

Class ConfigurateException

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Throwable
java.lang.Exception
java.io.IOException
org.spongepowered.configurate.ConfigurateException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ParsingException, SerializationException
public class ConfigurateException extends IOException
Any sort of error thrown within Configurate.

Configurate's errors are designed to provide a view of as many errors as possible within one configuration tree, through the suppressed exceptions

Since:
4.0.0
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • wrap

      public static ConfigurateException wrap(ConfigurationNode source, IOException ex)
      Given an unknown IOException, return it as a Configurate type.

      If the input ex is already a ConfigurateException, this method returns the input value.

      Parameters:
      source - node where the source exception was thrown
      ex - the source exception
      Returns:
      an exception, either casted or wrapped
      Since:
      4.0.0
